I bring this Christmas edition to you from the first book of the Bible, Genesis 26:22-25. The events recorded in this chapter took place after Abraham‚Äôs death.

item.title: Letter to Young Mr Youth 2 (Youth Series).
item.description: 1.1¬†The Valley of Dry Bones ü¶¥ü¶¥ We have never heard of the mountain of dry bones but we have read of the valley of dry bones. Whose dead bones, were they? Men who once pursued their visions with vigour, self-determination. Men who conceived their dreams with crystal clear vision and articulated them.
